__e: Sweet Billy had God's own reason to be.
Sweet Billy, Sam, Lady, you claim you care about them.
I feel real bad about Sweet Billy but you've got other things to think about.
Seriously, what is the plan? What happens when Zoe gets tired of playing Sweet Home Alabama and goes back to New York?
I don't have to wait for the moment to be perfect, like it was for Reese Witherspoon in Sweet Home Alabama.
I've waited my whole life to say this... home, sweet home.
